ygData.msgSnippet: Bezerker comes ripping out of the foliage. His claws propel him fast across the soft ground as the protohuman in front of him runs as fast as his bipedial legs

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Bezerker comes ripping out of the foliage. His claws propel him fast 
across the soft ground as the protohuman in front of him runs as fast as his 
bipedial legs can carry him.
       He had been hunting this human for the past hour and his mouth 
salvatated with a lust to eat this man. Bezerker came closer and closer. 
Teeth bared, senses alert, he sunk four claws in the mans back and brought 
him down.
       The human was screaming while Bezerker devoured his intestines, but as 
shock slowly crept into his nervous system he quited and left Bezerker to 
finish him off silently.
       "Now...Hell Beast....where are you?" He said whiping the blood from 
his animal forms mouth. The Baboon was a messy eater. "I smell you...and I 
will find you."
       Like a dash of lightning he took off agian. He was headed for the new 
base where Hell Beast's scent was strongest among the old systems from the 
Ice Cave.

       Clash made her was quickly through the new bases underbelly. She was 
repairing the shattered shiled generator from the laser blasts. Nothing to 
big or small that she couldnt handle. The roach made her way to the bridge.
       "Sir, everythings set. Ill take care of the shileds, just keep those 
jets busy." She said to Tarantulas as she sat at the computer system.

--part1_3a.110931e2.27c2f212_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
